summary: Comprehensive testing of P1 Kanban Board and Container Contents features completed. All 9 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing verified: Kanban Board with 7 columns and drag-drop functionality, Container detail dialog, Reports Container Tracking with View Contents feature, and all previous features (Payments Edit/Delete, Loadings Edit/Delete, Batch Document Upload) still working.
critical_code_review_comments: Kanban Board uses @dnd-kit library correctly for drag-and-drop functionality
Container status update validates forward movement and limits backward movement to one step
Container detail dialog shows comprehensive information including items table
Reports Container Tracking tab has both View (Eye) and Edit buttons for each container
All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created - used existing test data
context_for_next_testing_agent: All P1 features verified working: Kanban Board with drag-drop, Container detail dialogs, Reports Container Tracking with View Contents. Previous features (Payments Edit/Delete, Loadings Edit/Delete, Batch Document Upload) still working.

kanban_board_route.details: /kanban route renders Container Status Board with 7 columns (Draft, Confirmed, Loaded, Shipped, In Transit, Arrived, Delivered)

kanban_containers_grouped.details: 5 containers displayed and grouped by status columns correctly

kanban_detail_dialog.details: View button on cards opens Container Details dialog showing status, type, packages, value, and items table

sidebar_kanban_link.details: Kanban Board link visible in sidebar navigation with data-testid='nav-kanban'

reports_container_contents.details: Reports > Tracking tab shows View button that opens Container Contents dialog with utilization, weight, CBM, and items

payments_edit_delete.details: 11 payments with Edit/Delete buttons in Financial > Payments tab

loadings_edit_delete.details: 4 loading records with Edit/Delete buttons in Actual Loading page

batch_document_upload.details: Batch Upload button present in Document Vault page

frontend_e2e_tests.test: Container detail dialog opens on view button click
Container Contents dialog opens from Reports
Document Vault - Batch Upload button present
